product_name: Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 Foldable Tire - 26 x 2.1 / 26 x 2.25
long_description: The versatile Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 foldable mountain bike tire offers great trail performance and is tubeless-ready for all-around awesomeness. Designed for both dry and muddy terrain, crown's tread is arranged to balance performance between grip, transferring rider output and self-cleaning. Tire shoulders feature knobs tuned for consistent, efficient cornering. Single-compound, 63a durometer rubber stikes a great balance between longevity and grip. Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 foldable mountain bike tires are tubeless-ready (requires sealant, sold separately) and have a 60 tpi casing with folding aramid bead.
short_description: The versatile Michelin Wild Grip'R 2 foldable mountain bike tire offers great trail performance and is tubeless-ready for all-around awesomeness.
